TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Do not push the red button.
Try the green one, it gives candy!
Wait, isn't that the Tolb- *slotmachine winner Tolberones*
Wait I got a stock pile of party cannons!
After years of misuse, Rage097 proceeded to collapse into the nearest junk pile and rust until he is of use to someone again.
A boy comes with the creative mind to collect you scrap reboot you to become a marching war machine that self replicates ,but contain a different personality.
aww, I wanted to turn Rage into a kitty...
Sorry I turned him into a new machine that is self aware with a imperialistic design ,and ideology.

I'm currently need a kitten IRL simply because i'm recovering from THIS LINK ITS SO STUPID.

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php

I must admit, that knowing about existence of people, still believing in flat earth is quite depressing...

I must admit, that knowing about existence of people, still believing in flat earth is quite depressing...

Is it too soon to make jokes?

Is it too soon to make jokes?

Absurd after reaching some threshold aren't funny anymore and become just sad .

also

http://www.cluesforum.info/viewtopic.php?p=2369073

also

http://www.cluesforum.info/viewtopic.php?p=2369073

Oh god thats too funny.

Oh god thats too funny.

Actually, this is funny: squirrels on mars o_o.

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php/topic,58816.0.html#.Ua2e9D7E1rZ
I like how one of them is "criticising" NASA's site by comparing it to a site about ghosts.

They may try and get to Mars, if they are completely suicidal and not too concerned about the 100% possibility of getting completely chewed up by the vacuum of space, long before they get anywhere near Mars or any other planet, or even in low orbit. I think all the info about cold welding should be added to the locked thread titled "THE APOLLO HOAX mother of media fakery". This information should now be seen as the foundation of all the research on here exposing space travel as a complete fraud, because we have proven it scientifically.

FAIL this makes me want to shoot myself
I would sell both kidneys and a liver (not necessarily my own ;p) just to blast the guy into space and see his pitiful face... no... they could think this is a Hoax anyway :-/.
Luckily, about half of them are just there for fun, and not because they necessarily believe in any of it. The rest, though.
It's hard to tell how many people are being serious or just silly there.
...continues to rust. Except now he's clinically depressed at the above links.

This one is Rocket, or Rocky.

And this one is Molly. Sorry about the fuzzyness, she's a wild one.

This could help! They are so cute!!!

*Looks at above and previous links*

How can people be so stupid?
I swear, I can't live normally knowing that they exist.

I swear, I can't live normally knowing that they exist.

Don't be suicidal, be homicidal!

We should just strap all of those people to a rocket and send it into orbit. If they survive they could see how wrong they are before the orbit decays and crashes into the earth.

Don't be suicidal, be homicidal!

We should just strap all of those people to a rocket and send it into orbit. If they survive they could see how wrong they are before the orbit decays and crashes into the earth.

I actually thought about this. I thought that when commercial spaceflight becomes slightly less expensive, I'd hook up a deal with the administrator of the website and send him into orbit. have cameras all over the place and have him post them to the site and then close all the threads.

Or we could just show them this:

And have them stick a camera onto a helium weather balloon.
